name: .XCFILELIST File Extension
summary: Learn about .XCFILELIST files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open XCFILELIST files with Apple Xcode in macOS. If an XCFILELIST file is in your project, you can navigate to the file in your project's directory via the Project Navigator. You can also open an XCFILELIST file by selecting File â†’ Open.

Since XCFILELIST files store plain text, you can also open them with any text or source code editor. Some options include Apple TextEdit (bundled with macOS), Microsoft Notepad (bundled with Windows), and Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
